mapper.select: select boardid, writerid, username, title, writedate, boardupdatedate from `user`, board where userid=writerid and board.deletedate is null and `user`.deletedate is null order by writedate desc;
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, boardupdatedate=now() where boardid=#{boardid};
update board set deletedate=now() where boardid=#{boardid};
